document.full_text: nebraska athletic director tom osborne is hoping bo pelini's new five-year contract wards off teams that might want to hire the cornhuskers' head coach.
document.title: new contract to pay nebraska's pelini $3m in 2014
lines_and_colors: nebraska athletic director tom osborne is hoping bo pelini's new five-year contract wards off teams that might want to hire the cornhuskers' head coach.
